text: Oscar Benton (born Ferdinand van Eis, 3 February 1949 – 8 November 2020) was a Dutch singer. He was also the founder of the Oscar Benton Blues Band in 1967. He was born in Haarlem, Netherlands. His career lasted from 1960s to 1980s. In 1968, the Oscar Benton Blues Band released its first album, Feel so good. In 1969, they released the album The Blues Is Gonna Wreck My Life. In 1971, they released Benton ‘71. On 8 November 2020, Benton died in IJmuiden, Netherlands at the age of 71. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Dutch singers
title: Oscar Benton
